summary: Participants introduced themselves and their roles: Sarah (PM) will coordinate scope and planning, the Architect is available after stand-up for architecture questions and design reviews, Alex (Developer) offered to pick up or review work, and Jordan (QA) will test items when ready.

actions.task: Coordinate project scope, planning, and overall coordination
Be available after stand-up to answer architecture questions and review design proposals
Pick up or review development tasks as assigned
Test items when they are ready and respond to pings for testing

backlog_deltas.title: Add development tasks queue for Alex to pick up or review
Add QA testing tasks to backlog; assign to Jordan when ready

risks.risk: Architecture review delays could block development
risks.mitigation: Schedule a brief post-stand-up review, have the Architect prioritize responses, and PM to follow up

risks.risk: Unclear initial task assignments may lead to developer idle time
risks.mitigation: PM to assign or confirm next tasks for Alex during planning and communicate priorities
